item.title: Plot Missing Values
item.description: In the 2nd day of my #100DaysOfCode challenge, I want to try visdat package to visualize missing values. Then, I will show you how we can do a similar plot using ggplot2 package. Then, using the second method, I will show you in addition to missing values we can visualize any other value(s). There are many ways to inspect and find about missing values. Letâ€™s use summary() functions from base R to explore missing values in airquality dataset.
